option.value: Student-Engagement in Virtual and In-person Classrooms

string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

search.slidetext: student- engagement in the virtual and in-person classroom students and the price of paying attention

student-led learning student collaboration and class discussions adapt lessons based on student reflections project-basedassessments having fun have fun with the content make it fun and rewarding to demonstrate knowledge provide a variety of activities clear expectations create guidelines and rules with students checks for understandings ensure students feel comfortable asking questions prior knowledge make learning relevant builds motivation to understand gauge student knowledge ⬇️ click on each to learn more! ⬇️ provide opportunities for student-led learning have fun set clear expectations activate prior knowledge student-engagement can be improved using these 4 classroom techniques: student-engagement involves maintaining consistent focus from students to enhance and ensure retention of information. what is student-engagement?

proceed proceed good job! your students are fully engaged! play background music during class play background music during class play background music during class play background music during class play background music during class play background music during class activate prior knowledge activate prior knowledge activate prior knowledge activate prior knowledge activate prior knowledge activate prior knowledge make all assignmentsgroup-based make all assignmentsgroup-based make all assignmentsgroup-based make all assignmentsgroup-based make all assignmentsgroup-based make all assignmentsgroup-based student-led learning student-led learning student-led learning student-led learning student-led learning student-led learning have fun have fun have fun have fun have fun have fun provide essay assignments daily provide essay assignments daily provide essay assignments daily provide essay assignments daily provide essay assignments daily provide essay assignments daily set class expectations set class expectations set class expectations set class expectations set class expectations set class expectations give long lectures and explanations give long lectures and explanations give long lectures and explanations give long lectures and explanations give long lectures and explanations give long lectures and explanations click on the correctclass activities and procedures that will engage the student! check for understanding %cfustudentengagement%

if you want to review a certain topic, you can click their respective rectangle below. make sure to view all of the ways before the end of the presentation! let’s dive deeper into what goes into these 4 ways to improve student-engagement! provide opportunities for student-led learning have fun set clear expectations activate prior knowledge

end presentation? make sure you’ve viewed all 4 ways before ending it! end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? build student motivation to understand and learn more learn what knowledge students already have real-world examples provide context for learning students see the content as relevant and relatable activate prior knowledge

end presentation? make sure you’ve viewed all 4 ways before ending it! end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? students understand negative and positive consequences of their actions create expectations with students consistency creates a reliable learning environment set routines for instruction, discussion, and independent work time set clear expectations

end presentation? make sure you’ve viewed all 4 ways before ending it! end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? use anecdotes to relate learning to your own experiences provide a variety of activities to demonstrate knowledge gamify assignments and discussions teach the content with interest and enthusiasm have fun

end presentation? make sure you’ve viewed all 4 ways before ending it! end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? end presentation? help students feel safe asking questions student can frequently reflect on their learning provide opportunities for students to collaborate let students lead class discussions, but give regular feedback student-led learning
